content.query:
--CREATE SCHEMA andy


IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'customer' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'andy')
DROP TABLE andy.Customer

CREATE TABLE andy.Customer
	(
	 [Name] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Address] nvarchar(4000),
	 [City] nvarchar(4000),
	 [State] nvarchar(4000),
	 [PostalCode] bigint,
	 [Country] nvarchar(4000),
	 [PreferredStore] nvarchar(4000),
	 [RewardsPoints] bigint,
	 [CustomerRetailID] uniqueidentifier,
	 [img] nvarchar(4000),
	 [EmailId] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	 HEAP
	 -- CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC andy.bulk_load_customer
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO andy.Customer
(Name 1, Address 2, City 3, State 4, PostalCode 5, Country 6, PreferredStore 7, RewardsPoints 8, CustomerRetailID 9, img 10, EmailId 11)
FROM 'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/andyrob/raw/RetailCustomer.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM andy.Customer
GO
